FLOW.COMMENT: [v1.1] Save Parent errorInfo so it doesnt Accidentally get overwritten if child service doesnt fail

MAP.COMMENT: [v1.1] Save Parent errorInfo so it doesnt Accidentally get overwritten if child service doesnt fail
This is the only step where you set errorInfo/ServiceName

INVOKE.NAME: $default
INVOKE.COMMENT: concatenate the nodeHierarchy with the transactionElement
turn the stream into a node

RETRY.COMMENT: get each node and write to disk - EXIT when no more nodes left

Values.value: About to get Affected Item node

INVOKE.COMMENT: turn the node into a record

SEQUENCE.NAME: Asynchronously
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: publish notification and proceed with processing

Values.value: About to enter the BRANCH that encompasses PUBLISH Product Enterprise Document

SEQUENCE.NAME: $default
SEQUENCE.COMMENT: By default, directly call invoke service before proceeding

MAP.COMMENT: Scope the invoked service to only contain the desired pipeline values
De-Scope the results of the service invocation

BRANCH.COMMENT: Check to see if a failure and if it should be reported

INVOKE.NAME: %invokeError% == "true" && %returnInvokeFailures% == "true"
INVOKE.COMMENT: Build invokeFailure doc and add to list

MAP.COMMENT: [v1.1] Reset Parent errorInfo fields since this service is exitting successfully
